item.title: Women’s Day celebrated grandly in Gadwal
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The International Women’s Day celebrations were held grandly under the auspices of the District Women and Child Welfare Department at the District Collectorate’s conference hall. The event was inaugurated by District Collector BMSantosh, Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy, and SP Srinivasa Rao.
Speaking on the occasion, Collector Santosh emphasized that the progress of women leads to the development of society, and every individual should contribute to women’s empowerment to ensure t...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
